sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnbackupschduldfk ( backup_opert_id , execut_schdul_dfk_se ) VALUES ( #backupOpertId# , #executSchdulDfkSe# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnbackupschduldfk SET backup_opert_id = #backupOpertId# , execut_schdul_dfk_se = #executSchdulDfkSe# WHERE 1 = 1 AND backup_opert_id = #backupOpertId# AND execut_schdul_dfk_se = #executSchdulDfkSe#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnbackupschduldfk WHERE 1 = 1 AND backup_opert_id = #backupOpertId# AND execut_schdul_dfk_se = #executSchdulDfkSe#
sqlMap.select: SELECT backup_opert_id , execut_schdul_dfk_se FROM comtnbackupschduldfk WHERE backup_opert_id = #backupOpertId# AND execut_schdul_dfk_se = #executSchdulDfkSe#

SELECT backup_opert_id , execut_schdul_dfk_se FROM comtnbackupschduldfk WHERE 1=1
backup_opert_id = #searchKeyword#
execut_schdul_dfk_se LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY backup_opert_id DESC , execut_schdul_dfk_se DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnbackupschduldfk WHERE 1=1
backup_opert_id = #searchKeyword#
execut_schdul_dfk_se LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
